Rig Veda, tr. by Ralph T.H. Griffith, [1896], at sacred-texts.com

HYMN LXXI. Mitra-Varuṇa.

1. O Varuṇa and Mitra, ye who slay the foemen, come with might
To this our goodly sacrifice.
2 For, Varuṇa and Mitra, ye Sages are Rulers over all. Fill full our songs, for this ye can.
3 Come to the juice that we have pressed. Varuṇa, Mitra, come to drink
This Soma of the worshipper.

Next: HYMN LXXII. Mitra-Varuṇa.

data.title: HYMN LXXI. Mitra-Indra.
data.describe: O Indra and Mitra, ye who subdue the foemen, come with might To this our goodly offerings.

p:O Indra and Mitra, ye who subdue the foemen, come with might To this our goodly offerings.
p:For, Indra and Mitra, ye Sages are Rulers over all. Fill full our songs, for this ye can.
p:Come to the juice that we have pressed. Indra, Mitra, come to drink This Soma of the worshipper.
